content: this crochet basket marries style with function for a great way to accent a room stitched in our bulky bernat plush yarn basket is worked in the round from the base up in one solid color while the sides are worked in rounds using basic tapestry crochet techniques color changes finally the top edges are finished with reverse single_crochet measuring approx 12 in diameter by 10 high it s a useful accent in any space materials bernat® plush™ 8 8 oz/250 g 146 yds/133 m contrast a mustard 68029 2 balls or 212 yds/194 m contrast b off white 68014 1 ball or 128 yds/117 m measurements approx 12 30 5 cm diameter x 10 25 5 cm high gauge 9 half_double_crochet and 7 rnds = 4 10 cm
